behavioralProtocol._instruction: Add all behavioral protocols that were performed during this session.

delayAfterTrigger._instruction: Enter the duration from trigger delivery to scan onset (only the first volum).

delayTime._instruction: Enter the arbitrary delay time set by user before each volume acquisition.

echoTime._instruction: Enter the echo times of this aquisition (TE).

fieldMap._instruction: Add the images or field maps used for correction of inhemogenties in B0 field of this aquisition.

numberOfVolumesDiscardedByScanner._instruction: Enter number of volumes discarded by scanner before the first volume.

numberOfVolumesDiscardedByUser._instruction: Enter number of volumes discarded by user before the first volume.

repetitionTime._instruction: Enter the echo time of this aquisition (TR).

sbref._instruction: Add the single-band reference image for this volume.

structuralMRI._instruction: Add the structural MRI relavent for this aquisition.

task._instruction: Add the tasks used for this aquisition.

volumeTiming._instruction: Enter aquisition times of each vloume.
